pathAssistantSteps.info:
Pick a Denied Reason first, then mark the Resident as "Denied".


If multiple reasons exist, pick the most important for the Denied Reason and leave additional information in Denied Reason Comments.

Pick a Denied Reason first, then mark the Resident as "Drop Out".


If multiple reasons exist, pick the most important for the Denied Reason and leave additional information in Denied Reason Comments.
Graduation Date is populated automatically when Stage changes to "Graduated"

Ownership

1 complete denial | 2 fails to see their role in circumstances | 3 acknowledges with excuses | 4 acknowledge and taking steps to improve | 5 full ownership


Marketability

1 poor attitude | 2 hard to read / withholdingÂ | 3 needs intentional work | 4 needs polish | 5 professional


Fervor for Opportunity

1 indifference | 2 not seeing potential of the opportunity | 3 not knowing how to navigate opportunity | 4 excited and prepared to meet challenges | 5 ready to GO


Level of Need

1 need not detected | 3 temporarily has access to housing | 5 no access to housing, imminent need exists

Timeliness

1 no show | 2 late by 6+ minutes | 3 late by up to 5 min | 4 slightly late; communicated in advance | 5 on time/early


Initial Resume Quality

1 fake resume | 2 no resume | 3 poorly formatted | 4 complete with multiple typos | 5 complete resume


Resume Progress

1 header to one job description | 5 completed


Online Marketability

1 no work experience | 2 work gaps over 9 months | 5 great work experience with at least one job for over a year and no gaps


Homework Follow Up

1 did not complete any homework | 3 avg response of three days; with 1.5 errors; taking two weeks to complete | 5 left without homework


Level of Need

1 need not detected | 3 temporarily has access to housing | 5 no access to housing, imminent need exists

Financial Openness

1 refusal to disclose financial details | 5 immediate transparency to debts and accounts


Mathematical Acumen

1 unable to do any math, mental or otherwise; an obstacle to employment | 5 able to quickly formulate and solve mental math problems


Forward Thinking in Savings

1 multiple sources of debt, spends money as soon as it comes; no budget | 5 current savings separate from spending money; actively budgets


Interest in Learning

1 views session as a waste of time | 5 asks engaged questions; expresses interest in applying new info


Overall Aptitude

1 late, disengaged, defensive, undisciplined | 5 timely, engaged, curious, disciplined
